sample.description: Wild-type THP-1 macrophage. THP-1 human monocyte cell line (ATCC TIB-202) treated with PMA to differentiate into macrophages
sample.protocol: High pressure freezing, freeze-substitution resin embedding with 2% OsO₄ 0.1% UA 3% H₂O in acetone; resin embedding in Eponate 12.
sample.contributions: Sample provided by Huxley Hoffman and Schuyler van Engelenburg (U. Denver), prepared for imaging by Gleb Shtengel (HHMI/Janelia), with imaging and post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia). Segmentation and analysis by COSEM Project Team (HHMI/Janelia).
